subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In the days before the United States Open last week, scores of players were having degrees of loft added, and in some cases subtracted, from their putters. Why do putters have loft, anyway?
snippet: In the days before the United States Open last week, scores of players were having degrees of loft added, and in some cases subtracted, from their putters. Why do putters have loft, anyway?
